entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Kestrel TimingPipeFlusher calling WriteAsync when another write is pending, causing an exception (SSL) #43625
  • Support for custom authentication scheme without adding data protection #43624
  • Possible race condition in RemoteRenderer #43621
    7.0-rc2
  • SignalR C++ Client read access violation from signalr_client_config destructor #43617
  • React template should use UTF-8 #43616
  • Quic stream completion races with `Abort` #43614
  • Render image for static files logged in console browser 404 #43613

Closed

  • w3wp.exe Faulting Application Exception Code 0xc0000409 #43378
  • Perf regression: plaintext #43606
  • API Review for System.Web adapters (Part 3): Session/Auth #42092
    7.0-rc2
  • join the organization #43622
  • Make it simpler for customers to investigate Blazor Auth issues #39412
    7.0-rc1
  • Browser Link Errors after Disconnect #43571
  • Blazor WASM - TypeError: Window.fetch: HEAD or GET Request cannot have a body. #43602
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_actix, fortunes_dapper #43601
  • [Feature Request]: Make LinkGenerator support complex objects #43572
  • Content-Length and Transfer-Encoding conflicts #43523
    8.0-alpha1

PullRequests

Created

  • Pin language version in release branch #43629
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Pin language version in release branch #43628
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Update UpdatingMajorVersionAndTFM.md #43627

Merged

  • fix #43523 Content-Length and Transfer-Encoding conflicts #43558
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-alpha1
  • docs: Remove syntax error in xml docs for `AuthenticationBuilder` #43575
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-alpha1

Updated

  • [SignalR] Fix bug when combining streaming and client results #43552
    area-signalr
  • [release/7.0] Add and use RDF.InferMetadata and update new PopulateMetadata API #43543
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc2
  • Update SDK #43028
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1974269 #43599
    area-infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43596
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Triggering IConnectionLifetimeNotificationFeature on GoAway #43431
    area-runtime, community-contribution
